sentences.sentence: When I grew up, I became a professional astrophysicist.
sentences.translation: 长大之后，我成了一名职业的天体物理学家。

sentences.sentence: "It's going to happen," says astrophysicist Sara Seager of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
sentences.translation: “这即将就会实现，”美国麻省理工学院(MIT)的天体物理学家萨拉·西格尔(Sara Seager)说。

sentences.sentence: Astrophysicist Duncan Lorimer of West Virginia University in Morgantown calls the discovery "fantastic."
sentences.translation: 来自Morgantown西维珍利亚大学的天体物理学家邓肯·罗瑞墨认为，这是一个奇妙的发现。
